original_text: They paid bribes to government officers to work against the Israelite builders. Then they could not do the work. They continued to do this all the time that King Cyrus ruled Persia, until Darius became king.
korean_text: 바사 왕 고레스의 시대부터 바사 왕 다리오가 즉위할 때까지 관리들에게 뇌물을 주어 그 계획을 막았으며

sentences.original_text: They paid bribes to government officers
to work against the Israelite builders
Then they could not do the work
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그들은 그 일을 할 수 없었습니다

sentences.original_text: They continued to do this all the time

sentences.korean_translation: 고레스 왕이 페르시아를 다스리던 시간 동안
